title: Analysis of implicit function and tangent lines part - a

content.description: Consider the curve defined by x2+xy+y2=27 .
content.question: Write an expression for the slope of the curve at any point <math> <mrow> <mrow> <mo> ( </mo> <mrow> <mi> x </mi> <mo> , </mo> <mi> y </mi> </mrow> <mo> ) </mo> </mrow> </mrow> </math> .
